org.radix.serialization2

Class Serialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radix.serialization2.Serialization

  • public class Serialization
extends java.lang.Object
    Serialization class that handles conversion to/from DSON and JSON.

    • Method Summary

      • create

        public static Serialization create(SerializerIds idLookup,
                                   SerializationPolicy policy)
        Create a new instance of Serialization with the specified IDs and policy.
        Parameters:
        idLookup - The SerializerIds to use for class and property lookup.
        policy - The SerializationPolicy to use for determining serialization outputs.
        Returns:
        A new instance of Serialization.

      • toDson

        public byte[] toDson(java.lang.Object o,
                     DsonOutput.Output output)
              throws SerializationException
        Convert the specified object to DSON encoded bytes for the specified output mode.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to serialize
        output - The output mode to serialize for
        Returns:
        The serialized object as a DSON byte array
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if something goes wrong with serialization

      • getIdForClass

        public java.lang.String getIdForClass(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Retrieve serializer ID from class.
        Parameters:
        cls - The class to look up the ID for
        Returns:
        The serializer ID, or null if no serializer for the specified class.

      • getClassForId

        public java.lang.Class<?> getClassForId(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieve class given a serializer ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to look up the class for
        Returns:
        The class, or null if serializer ID unknown.
